title: Update Safety Data Sheet (SDS) Binder
description: A new type of sealant is being used on site. The safety manager must add its Safety Data Sheet (SDS) to the project's chemical safety binder.

tasks.description: Obtain the SDS for the new sealant from the manufacturer's website.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct SDS PDF is downloaded.

tasks.description: Upload the SDS to the project's digital SDS binder.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new SDS is successfully added to the central repository.
